body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Elijah Reed from Car Dealership X. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kimberly. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling frustrated because I can't find the car model I want in your inventory.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience. Can you provide me with the model name and color you are looking for?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. I'm looking for the Black Honda Accord.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can you also confirm the total budget you have allocated for the purchase of the Black Honda Accord?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My budget is five zero zero zero zero dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Kimberly. We will do our best to assist you in finding the Black Honda Accord within your budget. Is there anything else you would like to share or inquire about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kimberly. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
